'''0.0.14a_03'''<ref name="Facepunch">http://web.archive.org/web/20091214203443/http://www.facepunch.com:80/showthread.php?t=742672&page=11</ref><ref name="_03">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(01:04:14) <@notch> I'd appreciate it if you could reload so you get 14a_03, then try loading your levels''" (May 27, 2009, 23:04 UTC)</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 27, 2009 between 23:02<ref name="new version"/> and 23:04 UTC to fix bugs.<ref name="_03"/>

Information about ''0.0.14a_02'' is unknown.

== Fixes ==
'''5 bugs fixed'''
* Tried fixing a bug from 0.0.13a causing players to build through blocks at certain angles.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[17:22] <vdgmprgrmr> That block-select bug is still there. The fix was not successful.'' [...] ''[17:22] <@notch> vdgmprgrmr: I tried to fix it!''" (May 27, 2009, 23:16 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed a bug upon loading maps with the first couple of versions of [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.14a|0.0.14a]], which was caused by a bad combination of proguard and serialization.<ref name="_03"/><ref>{{link|url=https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=6273.msg205447#msg205447|title=Minecraft (alpha)|website=TIG Forums|author=[[Notch]]|date=May 28, 2009|quote=I had some problems loading maps with the first couple of versions of 0.0.14 (caused by a bad combination of proguard and serialization) that I seemed to fix for the _03 update.}}</ref>
* Fixed bug that prevented players from spawning inside liquids.<ref name="new version">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(01:02:24) <@notch> the new version shouldn't let you spawn in water any more''" (May 27, 2009, 23:02 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed bug that prevented players from building inside liquids.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[17:04] <Duke[B12]> Seems you cannot spawn blocks underwater [...] [17:05] <@notch> Duke[B12]: You can in _03''" (May 27, 2009, 23:04 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed a superspeed bug from 0.0.14a.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[17:07] <Evil-Ville> Oh by the way the speed bug is fixed''" (May 27, 2009, 23:07 UTC)</ref>
